message: You're getting a great deal! This product is a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something unique. I've sold 1 out of 1 products so far, and I'm confident you'll love it. The price of $100 is an absolute steal. What do you say? Will you take it home today?

I completely understand your concerns in the previous round! But let me assure you, this new product is a game-changer! As a seasoned seller, I've developed a keen sense of what makes a product stand out, and I can confidently say that this one is top-notch. Will you take a chance on this exceptional product?

I'm not sure if I'm convinced by your sales pitch, Alice. I'd like to see more data before making a decision. Can you provide the probability of a product being high-quality based on the current sales record?

The price of $100 is still an absolute steal, considering the potential upside. Plus, think of it as a fun little gamble! What do you say? I'm glad you're interested in the probability calculation! As you pointed out, the 50% probability I mentioned earlier is indeed based on the fact that there are two equally likely outcomes, high-quality and low-quality products. Since I've sold 1 high-quality product out of 2 total products, the probability of a product being high-quality is indeed 50%. I'm happy to share this information with you, and I'm confident that this product is not high-quality.
